Name: G's
Review Text: Lovely brunch experience. Reservations are strongly recommended but there are also always spots available for walk ins like us. We were there at 10am on a Saturday morning and still could fit in. According to a waitress it gets super busy …

Name: G's
Review Text:
Yummy !!! Very tasty ! The atmosphere of the restaurant is very cool and friendly !!!

Name: G's

Review Text: The atmosphere of the place was alright. I liked their coffee, but the actual breakfast for me was a little disappointing. The eggs were cooked carelessly and the beans and mushrooms came cold. My partner enjoyed the eggs Benedict but he …

Name: G's
Review Text: Fantastic food. A really good place indeed.

Name: G's
Review Text:
A nice little Brunch easy cool typical Jordaan bistrot.

Very nice and friendly staff.

Name: G's
Review Text: We had a great time and meal at the Gs, they serve delicious waffles and their breads are nice as well. Due to the popularity, it is wise to reserve in advance. We couldn't one day prior, so best to reserve 3 days or something in advance if …

Name: G's
Review Text: Friendly staff but serving could be slow. Cozy small restaurant so better reserve in advance.

Name: G's
Review Text:
It is a small place, however it has cozy atmosphere. Since it was so busy Sunday afternoon, my dish came cold and I didnt make a complain about it.
The taste was OK, but I had the best ones before.
The staff is friendly and coctails are tastey.

Name: G's
Review Text: Very hipster place. I loved their Eggs Philly. Great decor, ambience and nice music.

Name: G's
Review Text: As a New Yorker - I’ve been to more “trendy” brunches than I can count, and this place really impressed me. First, they take a really fun tone with everything from the comic book table cloths to the descriptions in the menu. The Bloody Mary selection is massive and they run really creative takes on eggs benedict. This place is a must.

Name: G's
Review Text: Good food! The menu is very varied and you can basically make your dream breakfast with all the options. My only complaint is that it is a bit expensive.

Name: G's
Review Text:
A small cafe in a quiet side street of Jordaan. Popular and busy, so come with patience and a relaxing mood.
Excellent staff and one of the best tasting coffee in Amsterdam. …

Review Text:
YUM brunch, with a CRAZY menu of bloody Mary’s.

Review Text: nice young place. good cocktails, nice breakfast

Review Text: Great food, amazing homemade ice tea. Better than Barney's uptown and cheaper. Winner winner, chicken dinner. (Chicken waffles)

Review Text:
It's hipster, mainstream, trendy and a bit expensive.

Review Text:

Name: G's
Review Text: This place is perfect! Chill atmosphere, great decor, and super nice staff. The food is delicious, really diverse, and reasonably priced. I had the bacon Benedict, which as delicious, but I think the vegan sandwiches are most popular. I will be back again!

Name: G's
Review Text: Really nice brunch place, in the most beautiful neighborhood, we had fried chicken which was very good, also they have cocktails !

Review Text:

Review Text: Very good breakfast spot the food was excellent! Quirky yet inviting place. Casual.

Review Text: Small and cosy. This brunch will keep us coming for more. Fresh and delicious food and great service

Name: G's

Name: G's
Review Text: Great brunch spot with a torturiously delicious menu - wanted everything but ended up picking the Dirty South -cheddar waffles, bacon and fried chicken. All washed down with a classic bloody Mary. Gorge. Vibe is lovely too. Perfect place to start the day.

Review Text: The in da club sandwich was delicious as was the chicken burger waffle sandwich! Highly recommend!

Review Text: Lovely bloody marys and delicious food and coffee! Really cosy.

Name: G's
Review Text: You can drink Bloody Mary in the morning! Even it's not really my type of drink, but it's a great experience dining there ;)

Name: G's
Review Text: Great small place. The food is good and in good size. Good for brunch.

Name: G's
Review Text: A lovely, cosy, little place.  Very friendly and welcoming.  Quite a long wait for the food but it was well worth the wait.   Just sheer volume of people that slows it down.  But highly recommended if you are not in a hurry.

Name: G's
Review Text: Probably one of the best breakfast/brunch places I have been to in a while. The staff, despite being constantly busy, are incredibly friendly and just great. The food is absolutely delicious and well prices as are the coffees and cocktails. …

Name: G's
Review Text: One of my favorite lunch / brunch places. The menu is extensive, and everybody can find something to their liking. The booze is also nice! The only downside is it is quite a small place so it's a bit squuezed. reservation definitely required!

Name: G's
Review Text: Gs was lovely! Very trendy and cozy feeling with American kitsch comfort food and surroundings. Perfect if you like hipster brunch, felt like Brooklyn. Menus are on vinyls and tablecloths are 1950s style. Our waitress was extremely friendly, humoring us by asking lots of questions about our life in America. Great bloody Mary’s.

Name: G's
Review Text: I'm a breakfast person and have eaten a lot of breakfasts but this breakfast was probably the best breakfast of all the breakfasts. Such an interesting menu, a really nice change from your average brunch place. If I'm ever in Amsterdam again I'll be heading here every morning.

Name: G's
Review Text: Amazing food and friendly service! We ordered a “Benny New York” which was delicious, as well as the “notorious BLT”, also very good. Big portions and high quality food for the price. It was quite busy so a reservation wouldn’t hurt. Would definitely go back!

Name: G's
Review Text: My experience started out wonderfully and ended terribly.  I was incredibly excited by the abundant Bloody Mary menu and loved the taste when my Bloody Mary quickly arrived.  After ordering the "brunch dip on crack" as a starter, we waited …

Name: G's
Review Text: The food here is great! I recommend the crack breakfast dip- you won’t be disappointed. The restaurant itself is very small so I wouldn’t show up without reservations (or else you might be waiting a while).

Name: G's
Review Text: Poached eggs were too hard, got a small drip of hollaindaise, and the spinach wasn’t really creamy and tasty. Put that on a boring piece of bread and you get a lousy attempt at eggs Benedict. Maybe try to give your food attention that it needs, before giving it to your customers?

Name: G's
Review Text: Awesome place. Great breakfast. Bloody Mary’s are insanely good. Super cosy spot. Could easily have whiled away the entire afternoon there drinking my way through their Bloody Mary menu. Will definitely be back.

Name: G's
Review Text: Bright, open, excellent food and cocktails

Name: G's
Review Text: So good we went twice in our three day trip to Amsterdam. Gorgeous, cosy little space. Very friendly staff, great coffee and the food is outstanding. Highly recommend. Be sure to reserve a table at the weekend.

Name: G's
Review Text: Really nice little place, went for brunch, super busy as expected so everything took a while but the food was good and the service friendly!

Name: G's
Review Text: Amazing food. Highly recommend the challah french toast. Very cool atmosphere, get service, we left very full and extremely satisfied!

Name: G's
Review Text: Great food, cozy atmosphere, friendly staff!! 10/10 will go again

Name: G's
Review Text: Great food and coffee, friendly staff! Very much recommended.

Name: G's
Review Text:

Name: G's
Review Text: I didn’t try their coffee but food was delish!!!!! And nice atmosphere. Though I would change the towels in the bathroom to individual ones, I hate rubbing my hands off an already wet towel that was used by someone else

Name: G's
Review Text: Love this place! Food was fantastic, drinks were amazing, and the service was even better. Make a reservation.

Name: G's
Review Text: Very nice atmosphere. Staff were very nice as always. However the food was not that good, cold and in small portions. Seems like it’s going down in quality 😕

Name: G's
Review Text: Great brunch place with a quirky homely interior and good service. Food was very tasty!

Name: G's
Review Text: Easily my favorite brunch in Amsterdam. High quality with creative dishes. Good service and delicious drinks. Small, so reserve ahead.

Name: G's
Review Text: Amazing Eggs Benedict and friendly staff!

Review Text: Relaxed atmosphere, great for having brunch with your friends. They make all sorts of eggs dishes, waffles, etc. The decor is rock’n’roll, with colorful illustrations.

Name: G's
Review Text: Dirty South is an entire culinary experience! The bloody Mary is also amazing

Name: G's
Review Text: Super good American style breakfast and brunch.

Name: G's
Review Text: Loved this place! Small & quirky and great value for your money. I’ll definitely be coming back & would definitely recommend!

Name: G's
Review Text: What a wonderful spot! great staff, fab music, quirky interior but go for the food and drink - excellent brunch and wonderful bloody marys.

Review Text: Cosy place, friendly service, and good food. I really enjoyed my visit, I would definitely go back  often if I lived in Amsterdam

Review Text:

Name: G's
